name: NASA Tool
semantic_context: Retrieve data from the NASA API
natural_language_description: 这是 NASA Tool 节点。主要用于: Retrieve data from the NASA API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Retrieve data from the NASA API
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Retrieve data from the NASA API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: astronomyPictureOfTheDay
available_options: Astronomy Picture of the Day (值: astronomyPictureOfTheDay)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get (值: get) - Retrieve Two-Line Element Set data

asteroidId.name: asteroidId
asteroidId.description: The ID of the asteroid to be returned
asteroidId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Asteroid ID | 作用: The ID of the asteroid to be returned | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: date (值: None) - Date of the image
dim (值: None) - Width and height of the image in degrees

download.name: download
download.description: By default just the URL of the image is returned. When set to true the image will be downloaded.
download.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download Image | 作用: By default just the URL of the image is returned. When set to true the image will be downloaded. | 默认值: True

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

lat.name: lat
lat.description: Latitude for the location of the image
lat.natural_language_description: 参数名: Latitude | 作用: Latitude for the location of the image

lon.name: lon
lon.description: Longitude for the location of the image
lon.natural_language_description: 参数名: Longitude | 作用: Longitude for the location of the image

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 20
